typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'query',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM DBO.CUSTOMER',
	store: 'snowflake') ~> customer
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'table',
	tableName: 'DEPARTMENT',
	schemaName: 'DBO',
	store: 'snowflake') ~> department
customer, department lookup(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LKdepartment
